name: Affiliate Product Review
author: Nazmun sakib

sections.description:
Affiliate Product Review is a powerful plugin you can add Easily turn Product Review , pros and cons, affiliate links into blog posts!

  • Beautiful Post meta UI: You can add all post review information from post meta.
  • Beautiful Frontend UI: The is really cool and typography matching automatically with your website.
  • No Limitation: There is no limit on Product Review. You add Unlimited.
  • Look Beautiful by Default: Affiliate Product Review offers a modern design that will style your product review and make it look professional without any design skills. Need to customize it? No problem, you’ll find several customizable options to reflect your brand.
  • Designed for Reader: We designed Affiliate Product Review for the readers, optimizing not for page views or engagement â€” but for reading.
  • Multilingual Ready: Affiliate Product Review is translation ready & WPML compatible. Build your website in any language – even in an RTL one!
  • Responsive & Retina Ready: Affiliate Product Review is 100% responsive to all major devices.

sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 7.3 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended

You can install the affiliate product review from your WordPress Dashboard or manually upload it through FTP.

OPTION 1: Install the Affiliate Product Review Plugin from WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to Plugins -> Add New.
  2. Search for ‘Affiliate Product Review’ and click on the Install button to install the plugin.
  3. Activate the plugin in the Plugins menu.
  4. Add add a new post look at the post editor bottom Check the box ‘Is Product Review ?’ then click the button ‘Add New Product Review’

OPTION 2: Manually Upload Plugin Files

  1. Download the plugin file from the plugin page: affiliate-Product-eview.zip.
  2. Upload the ‘affiliate-Product-eview.zip’ file to your ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory.
  3. Unzip the file affiliate-Product-eview.zip (do not rename the folder).
sections.faq:
Affiliate Product Review work with any theme?

Yes, the Affiliate Product Review works with any standard WordPress theme.

Do I need coding skills to use Affiliate Product Review?

Absolutely not! Affiliate Product Review is as easy to use, as you can think of.

Where can I report bugs or contribute to the project?

To report bugs or to contribute, head-over to the GitHub repository
